attributes.description:
BUILD FOR TOUGH IS ON IT's WAY!!! - This very popular Ford 2017 RANGER 3.2TDCI XLT P/U D/C is a real work hard, play hard bakkie. The design has changed and has gained an aluminum skid plate to protected the engine and the transmission from bumps and rocks. Its headlights were narrower. As for the fog lights, those were still rounded but protected by angular-shaped glasses. Inside it has a completely new interior, with better materials and an SUV-like design. The SYNC 2 infotainment system adorned the top of the center stack. Features include Auto Climate Control with Dual Temp 
17 Inch Alloy Wheels,Bluetooth Connectivity, Chrome Front Grille, Fog Lights - Front, Floor Mats - Front & Rear, Headlights - Auto On/Off Function, Parking Distance Control Rear,Parking Distance Control Front,Radio CD, Reversing Camera,Satellite Navigation. Full Dekra condition and roadworthy report. Price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.
